rarra was an inhabitant of the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Drarra was an elvish man with blue eyes and a greenish-olive skin tone. He wore fine-quality clothes and a big floppy beret decorated with two fanciful feathers.
In the , as the Cult of the Absolute menaced the city of Baldurs Gate, Drarra attended a performance of showy magics by three spellslingers, on the Murls Rest plaza in front of Sorcerous Sundries. The elf eagerly devoured the show with his eyes as the most fun hes had in the Gate, plagues by disappearings, murders, cultists, and corrupt politicians.
